name: Bitmovin
headline: Powers OTT online video providers with video developer tools.
description:
Bitmovin has been a first mover in almost every significant development in online video, from building and deploying the world’s first (and fastest) commercial adaptive streaming (MPEG-DASH/HLS) HTML5 Player, to being the first to achieve 100x realtime encoding speeds in the cloud. Bitmovin provides HEVC as well as VP9 live streaming with 60FPS and 4K resolution, and built the first containerized video encoding solution with Docker and Kubernetes.

Bitmovin products are completely in-house developed, easy and fast to integrate and highly customizable. In combination with our great support, documentation and SLAs, this is a true enterprise offering.

To find out more about Bitmovin’s video infrastructure solutions, or about any individual products, contact sales@bitmovin.com, or visit our website: bitmovin.com

founders.name: Christian Timmerer, Founder/CIO
founders.description: Researcher, entrepreneur, & teacher on immersive multimedia communication, streaming, adaptation, & QoE. CIO & Co-Founder @bitmovin | Assoc.-Prof @itecmmc

Cloud Native
## Reduce operating expense
Stream video in the highest quality while cutting costs with Bitmovin’s cloud-native solutions. The VOD Encoder optimizes file sizes and accelerates content processing, saving up to 50% on storage and bandwidth, while the Live Encoder ensures 24/7 broadcast-grade reliability and resiliency for events and linear channels. With dedicated SDKs, the Bitmovin Player guarantees seamless playback on all devices, reducing maintenance costs. Analytics provides deep insights to enhance performance and minimize downtime. Together, these products boost efficiency, automate processes, and lower your total cost of ownership. Plus, with [Cloud Connect](http://bitmovin.com/<https:/bitmovin.com/encoding-service/cloud-connect>), you can use existing cloud credits in your private instances on major cloud providers, further minimizing costs.
![video - Bitmovin](https://bitmovin.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/inline-generate-new-revenue-alt-2-min.jpg)
Ad Insertion
## Generate new revenue
Unlock new revenue streams with Bitmovin’s monetization capabilities, supporting AVOD, SVOD, and hybrid monetization workflows. Seamlessly integrate dynamic ads with support for both Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI) and Client-Side Ad Insertion (CSAI) for on-demand content, and utilize SCTE-35 markers for precise ad insertion during live broadcasts, turning your streams into profitable opportunities. Enhance ad playback with a dedicated ad module that keeps viewers engaged while gaining insights into ad performance, helping you maximize advertising opportunities and significantly boost revenue.
![video - Bitmovin](https://bitmovin.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/07/inline-retain-and-grow-subscribers-alt-min.jpg)
Flawless Video
## Retain and grow subscribers
Stream unparalleled viewing experiences with Bitmovin to retain and grow your subscriber base. Deliver flawless video while supporting the latest codecs for high-quality streaming, even in lower bandwidth environments. Provide a superior viewing experience across any screen with support for every major device, and gain insights into viewer behavior to analyze each session, boosting engagement and ensuring your audience keeps coming back.
End-to-end Video Workflows
## Solutions to power modern OTT video infrastructure
Deploy Bitmovin’s leading solutions seamlessly within your workflow and stream content in the highest quality anywhere in the world. Integrated with every major cloud and solution provider, Bitmovin ensures seamless integration, unmatched reliability, and scalability, enhancing your viewer’s experience and helping you reduce costs.

## OneFootball

OneFootball is committed to pushing the boundaries of live streaming and deployed Bitmovin’s Live Encoder, which runs on Akamai Cloud Computing, to ensure high-speed delivery and stunning visual quality.

Cloud Native
## Reduce operating expense
Stream video in the highest quality while cutting costs with Bitmovin’s cloud-native solutions. The VOD Encoder optimizes file sizes and accelerates content processing, saving up to 50% on storage and bandwidth, while the Live Encoder ensures 24/7 broadcast-grade reliability and resiliency for events and linear channels. With dedicated SDKs, the Bitmovin Player guarantees seamless playback on all devices, reducing maintenance costs. Analytics provides deep insights to enhance performance and minimize downtime. Together, these products boost efficiency, automate processes, and lower your total cost of ownership. Plus, with Cloud Connect⟨33⟩, you can use existing cloud credits in your private instances on major cloud providers, further minimizing costs.
![video - Bitmovin⟨111⟩]
Ad Insertion
## Generate new revenue
Unlock new revenue streams with Bitmovin’s monetization capabilities, supporting AVOD, SVOD, and hybrid monetization workflows. Seamlessly integrate dynamic ads with support for both Server-Side Ad Insertion (SSAI) and Client-Side Ad Insertion (CSAI) for on-demand content, and utilize SCTE-35 markers for precise ad insertion during live broadcasts, turning your streams into profitable opportunities. Enhance ad playback with a dedicated ad module that keeps viewers engaged while gaining insights into ad performance, helping you maximize advertising opportunities and significantly boost revenue.
![video - Bitmovin⟨112⟩]
Flawless Video
## Retain and grow subscribers
Stream unparalleled viewing experiences with Bitmovin to retain and grow your subscriber base. Deliver flawless video while supporting the latest codecs for high-quality streaming, even in lower bandwidth environments. Provide a superior viewing experience across any screen with support for every major device, and gain insights into viewer behavior to analyze each session, boosting engagement and ensuring your audience keeps coming back.
End-to-end Video Workflows
## Solutions to power modern OTT video infrastructure
Deploy Bitmovin’s leading solutions seamlessly within your workflow and stream content in the highest quality anywhere in the world. Integrated with every major cloud and solution provider, Bitmovin ensures seamless integration, unmatched reliability, and scalability, enhancing your viewer’s experience and helping you reduce costs.

generated_description:
Bitmovin is a powerhouse in the video streaming industry, primarily focusing on providing developers with robust tools to enhance over-the-top (OTT) video services. Founded as part of Y Combinator's S15 batch and operating from San Francisco with a team of about 145, Bitmovin quickly made its mark by pioneering various innovative technologies in online video.

From its inception, Bitmovin has led in significant advancements in streaming technology. They were the first to develop the adaptive streaming for HTML5 video, which employs technologies like MPEG-DASH and HLS. Furthermore, they have achieved incredible results in encoding speed, boasting up to 100x real-time elapsed processing in the cloud. Their offerings also include HEVC and VP9 for live streaming at 4K resolution with 60 frames per second—no small feat in today's competitive landscape.

Bitmovin's product suite is entirely developed in-house, ensuring tight integration and customization options tailored to client needs. Their flagship products include the Bitmovin Player, a highly performant and modular video player that ensures a seamless viewing experience across numerous devices. In addition, their analytics and encoding services give developers valuable insights and tools to manage video quality and playback efficiently.

The company's commitment to ease of integration is backed by robust documentation and dedicated support, making it an attractive option for enterprises looking to enhance their video streaming capabilities. 

For anyone interested in learning more about their services or products, they can visit [Bitmovin's website](http://bitmovin.com) or reach out directly via email at sales@bitmovin.com.
